review_text: This product works great, if the unit kept in the freezer for long enough, the consistency of the ice cream gets very good. It's easy to clean as well. I bought an ice cream maker so I could use organic ingredients, and everything has turned out fantastic so far. I have no complaints.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
